data.title: About Amundi
data.meta_description: Amundi, the leading European asset manager, ranking among the top 10 global players, offers its 100 million clients - retail, institutional and corporate - a complete range of savings and investment solutions in active and passive management, in traditional or real assets.
data.text:
Amundi, the leading European asset manager

We offer our 100 million clients - retail, institutional and corporate - a complete range of savings and investment solutions in active and passive management, in traditional or real assets. This offering is enhanced with IT tools and services to cover the entire savings value chain. As a pioneer, we continue to lead the way in responsible finance.

2025 Ambition: accelerating our transformation in favour of fair transition

Launched in December 2021, our new societal plan has the ambition of further strengthening our commitments, for both savings and investment solutions for our clients and our engagement policy with companies. ESG objectives will be included in the remuneration of our senior executives and we will also present our climate strategy to our shareholders.

Our ESG approach

2025 Ambition: accelerating our transformation in favour of fair transition

Launched in December 2021, our new societal plan has the ambition of further strengthening our commitments, for both savings and investment solutions for our clients and our engagement policy with companies. ESG objectives will be included in the remuneration of our senior executives and we will also present our climate strategy to our shareholders.

Our ESG approach

A commited employer

Our corporate culture is based on four core values: courage, team spirit, entrepreneurship and solidarity. We have chosen to place our employees’ individual and collective development at the heart of our responsibility as an employer. Our philosophy is to apply the principles of sustainable development to our own operations, with a particularly demanding policy in terms of corporate social responsibility (CSR).

Our responsibility as an employer
